properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Supplying of plastic volume

properties.Observatio: It is located on the edge of paddy and has no boundaries or stock tank. The spring has been preserved by sinking concrete rings and covered the top of well. (Dia-1.2m, H=0.9m)
properties.Descriptio: Establishing a water filtering system/Supplying of 2000 L Polymer water tank/Supplying of plastic volumetric water meters/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observatio: Located in Wedathanna Kandura. Water from a canal leading from the water springs is collected in a catchpit and distributed trough a stock tank. The catchpit has no cover and the boundaries are not marked. .There are no filtration system.

properties.Observatio: Water is taken from the HN 1 canal, through a sub canal to the vicinity of the stock tank. There is no filtering system and the boundaries are not marked.
